title: Please help ID font. pixelated squares
content:
Ive recently dicovered current.com and I really like the simple pixelated square text logo.

Any help identifying it?

[current.com logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20090929105632/http:/current.com/)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [currenttv.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090929105632/http:/typophile.com/files/currenttv.jpg) | 3.57 KB |
author: dontbugme

comments.content: Thanks for the site. I found the font they used there. For future reference, the font they use is called [Monkey Pixel](http://web.archive.org/web/20090929105632/http:/fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/moonkey_pixel).
